fullplot: Fifteen-year-old Beni falls in love with Fègi, a singer in a Rock band. As Fègi seduces him, Beni is willing to follow him where ever he takes him. But Fègi is a drug addict and pulls Beni deeper and deeper into his addiction.

title: Fègi Is a Bastard
